name: Orbz (Alixxir, dillanhoyos)
description:
Orbz is a game whereby you have to train your FPS skills by not only clicking on the targets, but you also have to combine colours too!

Combine the primary colours to match the colour box and double your score! All whilst maintaining as high of a score mutliplier as possible!

The higher your score, the more intense the music will get, can you unlock all of the audio variations in one play session?

Available on Mac & PC!
